Ritas Haus ist ein Traum. Die Lage und die Umgebung sind wunderschön. Das Haus ist sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet und hat alles, was man braucht. Man kann gut selbst kochen. Der kleine Pool ist im Sommer ideal. Wir haben den grossen Aussenbereich mit Hängematte und Liegestühlen genossen. Die Katze Faisca ist sehr herzig und kontaktfreudig. Das Haus ist gut gelegen, um die schönen umliegenden Städtchen zu besuchen. Wir würden jederzeit wiederkommen.

Fantastique. Incroyable coin de pays et maison de rêve.  Plus que positif!

Wow.
Rita was amazing. Extremely helpful, always available, and great travel tips. The location was extremely relaxing. We loved our stay.

The house is very pretty. The outdoor area is particularly beautiful. You shouldn't be allergic to cats though as there is a cat on the premises and she loves attention. If you leave food on the outdoor dining table, she'll eat it so don't leave food unattended. ;)

Rita’s place is beautiful and immaculately maintained.  Quiet and peaceful to enjoy the Italian countryside in peace and tranquility.  Close to the beach and towns for sightseeing. We loved our stay and look forward to returning soon.

We really enjoyed our stay at Lamia Doppia and in particular the secluded location, the beautiful view on the vineyards, the little pool and the great time drinking Aperol Spritz, eating Italian antipasti and having barbecue in the evenings.

Angela was super kind and it was our pleasure to take care of little „tiger“ during the last days. Overall, we can definitely recommend spending some lovely days in Rita‘s home in Puglia.

description.summary: Situada no Vale D’Itria, famoso pelos ‘trulli’ e pela produção de azeite extravirgem, a Lamia Doppia é uma construção antiga típica local e totalmente reformada. Encontra-se imersa entre oliveiras e escondida em um pequeno paraíso rural a apenas 20 minutos de praias de areia branca e mar turquesa, e a apenas 5km de um dos mais belos borgos da Itália: Cisternino. Um ótimo destino para qualquer época do ano, aqui pode-se aproveitar sempre do clima ameno e ensolarado do sul da Itália.
description.space:
‘Lamia’ é uma construção típica da Puglia datada a partir do século XV. Feita em pedras locais era originalmente usada como depósito pelos camponeses. Atualmente estas construções brancas, juntamente com os trulli, estão sendo recuperadas e transformadas em belas casas de campo, polvilhando a paisagem rural desta surpreendente região no ensolarado sul da Itália.
A Lamia Doppia consistia em duas lâmias independentes que foram unidas, adaptadas e totalmente reformadas mantendo suas características originais e típicas, o teto abobadado (uma lamia em estrela, a outra em ‘botte’), as paredes e piso de pedra local, a antiga lareira de funcionamento perfeito, a velha cisterna para captação da água da chuva. Respeitando suas principais características o projeto de reforma conseguiu incluir modernos banheiros, cozinha integrada, pergolado externo, grandes janelas e piso aquecido em uma construção antiga e cheia de personalidade. 
A Lamia Doppia encontra-se em um terreno de 10.000 m2, ao lado de uma plantação de oliveiras e de parreiras e com vista panorâmica de onde se pode admirar um explêndido por do sol!

We are also located 25 minutes away from beautiful beaches on the Adriatic side such as Torre Cane and Rosa Marina.

description.house_rules:
1. PARTIES - It is not allowed to promote parties or events in the house.
2. GARBAGE - Please carefully observe the rules for separating and recycling garbage. Garbage that is not correctly separated cannot be disposed of, generating a fine for the owner of the house, which may be passed on. During your stay, if you prefer not to take your rubbish to the authorized disposal point, collection can be made upon prior request and an additional fee of EUR 40, to be paid in cash at the time of collection or check-out.
3 - PETS - If you are planning to stay with your pet, please let us know to check availability. We do not accept large animals or more than one animal. We have a very special cat on the property!
4 - CLEANING - For cleaning during your stay, please request availability. The charged amount of EUR 15 / hour must be paid directly to the employee in charge. On this occasion, it is possible to request the change of bed and bath linen, upon prior notice, at a cost of 10 EUR per person.
5 - SPECIAL TIME FOR CHECK IN AND CHECK OUT - Check in earlier than 4 am or after 9 pm, and check out after 10 am must be requested in advance and will be subject to availability and fees. Please consult before confirming the reservation.
6 - DAMAGE - Accidents can happen. Please let us know as soon as possible if any object breaks or something is damaged on our property, so that we can quickly replace it or proceed with a refund.

Gu home è stata la cornice perfetta della nostra vacanza a Pantelleria. È dotata di ogni comfort, dalla piscina all’idromassaggio, dai diversi solarium alle camere ampie e dotate di bagno personale. Per non dimenticare della vista mozzafiato sul faro di punta Spadillo. La casa è arredata e rifinita con gusto con mobili unici ed elettrodomestici funzionali. Tutte le camere dispongono di un accesso esterno che le rende indipendenti e la doppia cucina rende molto vivibile anche lo spazio esterno. Il tutto è poi condito dalla disponibilità di Anna e Patty che ci hanno coccolati come pochi sanno fare offrendoci anche un aperitivo di benvenuto presso una piccola cantina locale e supportandoci sia al check in che al check out. Consigliatissima per un soggiorno all’insegna del relax e della spensieratezza! Torneremmo sicuramente molto volentieri!!

description.summary: Dammuso Bacio Pantesco è un luogo di pace situato all’interno di un residence sulla costa ovest e gode di una vista privilegiata sul tramonto unico di Pantelleria. L'accessso a mare è a soli 5 min a piedi.
description.space: Il Dammuso consiste di un soggiorno-cucina abitabile e una camera da letto matrimoniale. Entrambe le stanze sono dotate di aria condizionata. Il bagno è completo di doccia, lavandino e bidet. Il Dammuso è rifinito all’interno in parquet e all’esterno con dell’elegante legno e piante curate. Nell’ampia terrazza, potrai rilassarti al sole e goderti le serate  al fresco. Pulizie a fine soggiorno incluse.
description.notes:
L’ubicazione strategica ti consentirà di raggiungere facilmente luoghi trai i più affascinanti di Pantelleria: Nikà, Balata dei Turchi, Martingana, Cala Levante, Gadir, Punta Spadillo, lungo la costa. All'interno dell'isola: il lago Specchio di Venere, le vallate di Monastero e della Ghirlanda. In montagna: i sentieri tra i boschi di Montagna Grande e Monte Gibele.
L’affascinante e piccolo paese di Scauri si trova a soli 5 minuti in auto. Il centro di Pantelleria e l’aeroporto, a circa 20 minuti di distanza. Nell'area attorno al Dammuso, troverai ristoranti eccellenti, bar e cantine dove gustare i più famosi vini di Pantelleria.
description.neighborhood: Il dammuso si trova sulla costa ovest dell'isola con una vista priviligiata sul tramonto a mare. Nelle immediate vicinanze: ristoranti, bar, supermercato, panificio, farmacia, mercato, cantine vinicole.

WOW!! This was the BEST Airbnb experience we have ever had! We have traveled around Europe for the past 3 weeks and stayed at various Airbnbs, ranging in price and size. We were really lucky to have amazing homes and hosts everywhere we went, but Villa Nenno surpassed them all! As beautiful as the pictures are, the home is even better than we expected - luxurious, spacious, great ac, unbelievably gorgeous view. Carmela and Mario were exceptional hosts. Carmela connected us with an amazing driver, Gianni, who picked us up in Naples and arranged a fantastic tour of Pompeii for us - he also arranged our travel back to the Naples airport. Mario was so kind and friendly, carrying our luggage and giving us all the information we needed to enjoy the home and the Almafi Coast. They provided wonderful recommendations and local resources. And Conca dei Marini is a gem - hands down the best place to stay in all of Almafi. Quiet but also lively, and full of friendly charm with delicious food.

I recently stayed at Carmela’s villa and couldn’t recommend it enough. We had an amazing time and really enjoyed how easy the whole process was and the list of local recommendations that were provided to us. We felt like we were right at home.

Carmela & Mario 연락도 잘 되어 편리하게 이용 할 수 있었습니다.

The bus stop was located right at the bottom of the steps to the villa. There are quite a lot of steps so you need to be ready for about 170 of them. However it’s definitely worth the view when you get to the top!

We loved our stay!!

Our trip to Amalfi Coast far surpassed our expectations while staying at Carmela’s Villa in Conca dei Marini . The accommodation and  it’s craftsmanship were top notch. The home was much bigger than expected with plenty of room for our party of three. We made use of the garden and patio, enjoying the loungers and hot tub after our daily activities. Having vespas we were able to explore the coast and surrounding towns. There was ample parking available on the street below the accommodation. We were welcomed by Mario and acquainted to the home, amenities and local points of interest. Carmela was always available when needed and was prompt with communication. I highly recommend Carmela’s place to Airbnb guests.

Gorgeous and stunning, no other words could describe the view and the location . Overseeing the amalfi Bay Area , this house is worth the climbing of stairs ( usual in amalfitean cost ) . Peaceful and privacy are the rewards .
The host is proactive, helpful and very nice .The house is big ,clean and well equipped. What else to enjoy Italy .
Just to be noted that people aged or not in good physical condition may find the stairs a bit tough to climb .
Beside , a wonderful experience that we recommend .

description.summary:
Hanging between sky and sea, Villa Nenno rises. 
Located in the heart of the Amalfi Coast in Conca dei Marini, halfway between Amalfi and Positano, it is the perfect location to easily reach any place you want to visit. 
At the same time, its elevated position ensures that our guests can enjoy the utmost privacy and enjoy a spectacular view of the sea, mountains and coastline. 
Complete with any comfort and amenities, it is the ideal solution for all travelers.
description.space:
Villa Nenno, with its 200 square meters, allows guests to enjoy maximum comfort with 2 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a spacious living room, a kitchen and an outdoor terrace and garden that make everything even more special.

The master suite, lofted in a beautiful dome typical of the Amalfi coast, has a very comfortable queen-size bed, a spacious walk-in closet and a private bathroom.

The second bedroom is located on the ground floor, with a queen-size bed and a single bed, a wardrobe for storing your personal items, a desk and a private bathroom.

The spacious and bright living room has two comfortable sofas from which you can admire the sea or relax and watch TV (smart TV with Amazon Prime included), and from the living room you can access the third bathroom, the laundry room and the terrace.

The kitchen is fully equipped with all the appliances you may need to cook any dish (coffee machine, toaster, kettle, microwave, classic oven, dishwasher, refrigerator, freezer and 5 burners). There is also a dining table where you can eat and magnificent ceramics from a local producer.

You will also appreciate all the ceramic decorative elements throughout the house (if you want to buy ceramics, we have an agreement that guarantees you a special discount).

The strong point of the villa is undoubtedly the outdoor spaces: the terrace and the garden.
On the spacious terrace there is an imposing lava stone table where you can eat in the fresh air even on the hottest days with a view of the divine Amalfi coast.
The natural grass garden is perfect for tanning on comfortable sun loungers, if it gets too hot you can cool off with the outdoor shower, take refuge in the shade of typical mandarin trees or take a bath in the spacious hot tub.

Other amenities that will certainly please guests are the free wifi and air conditioning that is both hot and cold.
In short, Villa Nenno is designed to meet all the needs of our guests.
description.access:
To reach the villa, about 170 steps must be taken, which separates it from street level.
SITA Bus stop is just 10 meters from the steps, with which you can reach Amalfi and other nearby places.
The Conca dei Marini municipality provides a shuttle service, which allows you to reach restaurants, bars, supermarkets and, in particular, the Conca dei Marini beach, one of the pearls of the Amalfi Coast with maximum comfort.
description.notes:
We guarantee efficient communication to our guests with a concierge service available throughout the day (excluding nighttime) and throughout the stay.

The Conca dei Marini municipality has a tourist tax of 2€ per night per person, which we will collect at check-in.
description.neighborhood: The Villa is located in a high position above other homes, allowing guests to enjoy maximum privacy, tranquility, and security due to exclusive access to the villa.
description.transit:
The bus stop is 10 meters from the steps leading to the Villa.
Essential services such as a pharmacy, bar, supermarket and restaurants can be reached in a few minutes on foot.
A shuttle service is also active within the Conca dei Marini municipality, useful for reaching any location without problems.
For those who love to walk, Conca dei Marini is the ideal place due to the low traffic and panoramic view.
description.interaction:
Helping our guests is a pleasure as well as a duty.
They will have a concierge service available throughout the day (with the exception of night-time) and for the entire stay.
We can help our guests to organize many experiences like cooking class, boat tour and much more.

description.summary: The house is located just 7 km from the White City, in the beautiful countryside of Ostuni and is Surrounded by one hectare of land, it boasts about seventy olive trees, some of which are centuries old. It is located in a quiet area, but not isolated, from which the most beautiful beaches of Salento and some of the most beautiful villages in Italy such as Alberobello, Martina Franca, Cisternino are easily accessible.
description.space: The house consists of two units adjacent, but not communicating, with separate entrances. In the older part we find a double bedroom ( with en suite bathroom) and a living area equipped with a sofa bed and a study corner. The newer part consists of two double bedrooms each with en suite bathroom and a functional kitchen equipped with dishes, utensils, dishwasher, microwave oven, coffee maker, kettle, toaster and ice maker. Completing the property is a private swimming pool ( open from April to October) with solarium and a garden where there is a patio with kitchen ideal for hosting lunches and dinners. The property is also equipped with washing machine, two air conditioning pumps, underfloor heating to be usable all year round, TV in the bedrooms, gratings, mosquito nets, wi-fi coverage and private parking on site. Pets allowed.
description.access: The guests will have access to the entire property except for the pool pump room. The entire property is exclusively for personal use of the guests for complete privacy.
description.neighborhood: Il trullo si trova in una tipica Contrada salentina, immerso nel verde di ulivi secolari
description.transit:
Car is strongly recommended to enjoy everything the area has to offer.
The enclosed property offers plenty of parking.
Taxis from and to Ostuni and many Apulian villages are available.
description.interaction:
Our guest manager will greet the guests at the property, or where it is most convenient for them, for check in. Dedicated staff, off-site but nearby, will be available for assistance at any time during the stay, 24/7.

Both the house and the outdoor area are professionally cleaned and maintained. Bed linens and towels are provided, as well as beach/pool towels. The pool is maintained by professionals and is cleaned weekly.

If desired, for an additional fee, we can arrange daily cleanup (maid service).

Es hat zwei Schlafzimmer mit je einem Doppelbett und einem ausziehbaren Einzelbett. In den Schlafzimmern hat es wunderschöne Sterngewölbe aus Stein und im Esszimmer ein tonnenförmiges Gewölbe. Das Haus ist in traditioneller Weise, wie in der Region üblich, gebaut und hat ganz dicke Mauern, die entweder die Räume kühl oder warm halten. Es hat zwei Badezimmer mit WC und Dusche. Die Küche ist klein, hat aber alles, was man braucht! Eine Waschmaschine hat es auch
Villa Alessandra corrisponde esattamente alle foto. Si trova in una posizione tranquilla a pochi minuti di auto dal mare. Rosaria e suo marito si sono rivelati estremamente gentili e disponibili

description.summary:
La villa, di recente costruzione, è della tradizione architettonica salentina, con volte a botte e a stella.
La struttura è immersa in un giardino mediterraneo di circa 7.000 mq.
in un contesto di tranquillità e riservatezza, piscina,  doccia esterna, un patio ,zona barbecue.
Gli spazi interni, climatizzati:
- soggiorno divano letto (due posti), con angolo cottura completo
- due camere matrimoniali (nelle quali è presente un ulteriore letto singolo,due bagni completi doccia di cui uno en suite.
description.neighborhood:
La villa si inserisce in un contesto naturalistico di particolare pregio, caratterizzato dalla presenza di una rigogliosa vegetazione mediterranea, ulivi, fichi,  fichi d'india , lentisco, corbezzoli, capperi, piante aromatiche, mirto, rosmarino, timo, salvia e canneti perenni che nascono sulle sponde di antichi e suggestivi canali rocciosi. Ubicata nel cuore del “Territorio dei Fani”, riserva naturale protetta, la villa vanta una posizione unica e offre una vista mare che abbraccia un tratto di costa ionica che si estende per decine di chilometri. La Marina di Pescoluse dista dalla villa circa 1,5 km, è nota per la presenza di estese spiagge di sabbia bianca e finissima e acque cristalline sulle quali sorgono famosi lidi come  “Maldive del Salento” “ Le 5 vele”
 E’ servita dalla strada litoranea e dalla strada statale 274, strade che permettono di raggiungere comodamente tutte le altre rinomate località limitrofe da S. M. di Leuca Torre San Giovanni, Gallipoli, Porto Selvaggio, Porto Cesareo. ma anche interessanti borghi con alto valore storico artistico come Patù, Salve, Presicce, Alessano , Specchia e Tricase. Facilmente raggiungibile anche la costa Adriatica, partendo da Leuca e percorrendo la litoranea adriatica si può ammirare un paesaggio spettacolare attraversando località come Novaglie, il ponte del Ciolo, Marina Serra e il porto di Tricase , Castro, le grotte della Zinzulusa , fino ad Otranto e oltre.
 In zona  Pescoluse sono presenti tutti i servizi necessari oltre a parco giochi per bambini, negozi e un’ampia scelta di ristoranti di cucina tipica, pizzerie, bar e locali notturni.
Santa Maria di Leuca “Finis Terrae”, punta estrema della Puglia dove si incontrano il Mare Ionio il Mare Adriatico, dista dalla villa poco meno di 8 km.

recent.comments: Beautiful! Loved watching the sunset and waking up to the sea view! The place was perfectly equipped, Mauro and his wife really thought of everything. Furthermore they were extremely attentive and even gifted us a few local treats. Would stay again without hesitation! Also appreciated being close to both Scauri and Pantelleria Town. Hope to visit again!

items.comments: Beautiful! Loved watching the sunset and waking up to the sea view! The place was perfectly equipped, Mauro and his wife really thought of everything. Furthermore they were extremely attentive and even gifted us a few local treats. Would stay again without hesitation! Also appreciated being close to both Scauri and Pantelleria Town. Hope to visit again!

Petit Dammuso parfaitement adapté à la visite de la secrète, magnifique et hostile Pantelleria !! Un point de vue de la terrasse à couper le souffle, la réalité est bien plus belle que les photos… à deux minutes à pied se trouve une petite plage très peu fréquentée et agréable pour se rafraîchir le matin et en fin de journée. Nous avons également adoré cette terrasse où il fait bon vivre le soir avec une petite lampe pour apprécier la fraîcheur enfin arrivée !! Mauro a été un hôte merveilleux, plein de petites attentions tellement plaisantes…quelques produits régionaux et fruits à notre arrivée, un panier de mûres fraîchement ramassées par lui et ses enfants, un fromage délicieux du village d’à côté et enfin le dessert préféré de Mauro. Voilà un endroit où il fait bon vivre et l’on a qu’une envie, c’est de revenir dans ce lieu chargé de bons moments. Allez y les yeux fermés vous ne le regretterez pas et Pantelleria vous fera rêver avec sa mer et ses rochers fantastiques

Mauro is an exceptional host; starting with having someone greet us at the airport so we didn’t get lost. He’s a local who is a great communicator and shared some tips. The magazine he and his wife published along with the pdf for the property itself was very helpful. Pantelleria is a unique destination off the beaten path. Mauro’s restaurant recommendations and activity ideas really enhanced our stay. Plus the location off the main road is easy to get to at night yet quiet and peaceful. We appreciated being close to Scuari as it’s a cute village with a small port and a few trattorias and a couple bars plus the best gelato. The property itself is beautiful, well maintained and easy parking. The space is a traditional Dammuso but had natural light, thoughtful amenities, and a great shower. The covered terrace overlooking the sea is a wonderful start and end to your day. If you’re considering visiting pantelleria, I couldn’t recommend Mauro’s place more.

So I stayed at Mauro's home for just over three weeks and I must say I fell in love! The surroundings, the sea, the hills, the beautiful sun. 

Mauro (and his wife) were incredibly helpful if anything ever went slightly wrong and fixed all my problems. They're great. 

They even got my picked up and shuttled back to the airport with a friend which was very helpful. 

I'd thoroughly recommend staying here if you'd like to get some work done or just want some peace and quiet from the hustle and bustle of modern life :)

Grazie
come essere su una terra di mezzo tra mare, cielo e terra
Mauro ci ha accolto benissimo e la sua casa è splendida. Siamo stati molto bene anche grazie ai vari consigli e suggerimenti di Mauro. Consiglio fortemente, esperienza molto bella e rilassante

description.summary:
Dammusino indipendente davanti al mare. Fa parte di un dammuso più grande, è completamente separato e indipendente. Davanti zona balneabile, la mattina bagno a mare e colazione in terrazza. La notte si dorme con il rumore delle onde.
CIR 19081014C207525
description.space:
Apri gli occhi e il vento ti dirà cosa puoi fare durante la giornata.
Un tuffo nel blu davanti casa e l’acqua del mare ti sveglierà con un piacevole brivido.
Il sole ti asciugherà dolcemente mentre torni in terrazza per fare colazione.
I sapori dell’isola e un buon caffè ti daranno voglia di fare, o abbandonarti sull’amaca.
La luna di notte disegnerà la sua scia sul mare solo per i tuoi occhi.
Il rumore delle onde entrerà dalla finestra per farti dormire profondamente come un bambino.
..queste sono le giornate che ti meriti.
description.notes:
Siamo originari di Pantelleria, potremo quindi darvi tutti i consigli e l'aiuto necessario su come arrivare, assistenza per noleggio auto, motorini, barche/gommoni, escursioni all'interno dell'isola.
Il paese principale dell'isola con tutti i servizi è a 4 km. Sono presenti poi 8 contrade dove trovare alimentari, farmacie, ristoranti, pescherie, quasi tutti i servizi commerciali tranne il benzinaio, presente solo nel paese principale.
A 2 km c'è il porticciolo di Scauri, deliziosa insenatura dove potete affittare un gommone o altri barchini. In soli 10 minuti potrete così raggiungere il "dietro isola", la parte mare più suggestiva ed indimenticabile dell'isola.
Sono presenti sull'isola diversi ristoranti in tutte le contrade; vi diremo i più buoni e belli. Vi consigliamo però di alternare cene a ristorante con serate passate a casa; la cucina è perfettamente attrezzata e mangiare in terrazza spesso vince ogni confronto con il ristorante.
description.interaction: Noi siamo a 100 mt per ogni necessità o consiglio

description.summary: Il dammuso  Mared'ovest è unico nella sua impostazione di restauro per renderlo adeguato senza eccessi d'interventi  nell'accogliere nella vera essenza storica del dammuso pantesco chi decide di trascorrere una vacanza a Pantelleria. All'esterno i profumi di zagare degli agrumi, la visione dei tramonti,   il mare di Nikà, le passeggiate all'ombra dei grandi alberi di mandorli tra uliveti e tanti alberi da frutto rendono rilassante il soggiorno nel " vero dammuso pantesco".
description.space: Ogni dettaglio del dammuso è originale; dal colore verde mare delle porte interne- dal pavimento in maiolica decorata- dagli intonaci pitturati a calce-dai mobili restaurati con colori vivaci- dagli interruttori e prese in porcellana- dal lavandino del bagno in pietra lavica. Il dammuso è composto da una stanza da letto , formata da sala e alcova, una stanza con salotto, un' altra stanza da letto, una cucina e un bagno. All'esterno un lungo spazio coperto dal cannizzo con ducchene e fioriere

hosts.about:
Sono siciliana e la mia famiglia vive nella stessa casa da circa 200 anni e questo rende molto forte il mio senso di appartenenza a questa terra.
Ho lavorato per quasi 2 decenni in un ufficio con mansioni di responsabilità fino a quando ho deciso di cambiar completamente il mio stile di vita
Ho ristrutturato la villa di famiglia e ho iniziato questa avventura nel mondo dell’ospitalità e ho scoperto che è quello che mi piace fare
“FAI UN LAVORO CHE TI PIACE E NON LAVORERAI PIÙ UN GIORNO NELLA TUA VITA” è la verità. 
Per questo sono sempre di buon umore e non mi arrabbio mai

recent.comments: Ho soggiornato in questo alloggio per 2 notti con un gruppo di 12 amici. La casa è molto ampia e costituita da stanze indipendenti con bagno privato che danno sull'ampio cortile esterno, garantendo privacy agli ospiti. L'alloggio è immerso nella natura con splendida vista. Stefania è stata molto accogliente, gentile e disponibile in ogni momento in quanto abita nella stessa proprietà in una zona indipendente. La casa è curata nei minimi dettagli. Sono presenti due bagni per disabili. Cucina dotata di tutti gli elettrodomestici ed utensili per cucinare. La piscina non è grandissima ma è gradevole. Essendo la casa immersa nella natura è silenziosa, ma è necessario avere la macchina per qualsiasi tipo di spostamento (sono necessari circa 12 minuti per raggiungere il supermercato più fornito). Mi sento di consigliare questo alloggio.

hosts.about:
Pietro has a whole artistic education from high school to university. He’s a painter and most of our homes has a beautiful painting or drawing from his collection .. we are plunged to the art world and have many friends who expose their work in our homes
Gaia,have a degree in architecture in politecnico di Milano and then studied fashion merchandising at parson school in nyc then had an education in tailoring in the amazing Bagatto private school in Bologna ...
I normally sew items from our homes and make a lot of research in flea markets and antiques of little items to add and change details in our decor ...
We love to travel as a family of 4 and love to live in our homes when they are not booked just to experience the strengths and weaknesses to improve to our homes 
We live most of the time in Bologna our hometown and speak Italian English French and Spanish ...
We aim to connect each and every guests to the territory where they choose to stay,what we also live about our job is organizing weddings in our properties this is the best way to connect them to the area Musician, florists, caterings and many more local  vendors ...

description.summary: The magic of a holiday spent in Pantelleria lies in the beautiful mix between nature and architecture built by man: the terraces of cultivated fields with capers and grapes surrounded by drystone walls that design a fascinating path through the island, reaching the dammuso, the typical house of Pantelleria. All these fuse in the dammuso Magia Posidonia: a recently built dammuso, made up of local materials such as volcanic stones and that combines nature with the surrounding landscape.
description.space: Located in Contrada Penna, in the south west of the island, just near Scauri, the dammuso is immersed into a Mediterrean garden of two acres where you can abandon your senses to the perfume of aromatic plants, the beauty of fruit, capers and olive trees, and the colour of the bougainville.
description.access: The Dammuso Posidonia is a building of 300sq. meters where you can find six spacious rooms, each one with ensuite bathroom, air conditioning and tv. All the finishings are of excellent taste and really painstaking job, mixing modern and elegant solutions such as the colourful resins and the ecologic paint, contemporary and country furniture mixed together and objects inspired by nature. A unique style, suspended between the Mediterrean atmosphere and cosmopolitan splendour thanks to the objects selected with great taste all around the world.
description.notes: The external area has a chill out zone with sofas and arm chairs, a covered terrace with an external kitchen with wooden oven, perfect for lunches and dinners overlooking the sea, and one last treat: a beautiful 70 sq. meters swimming pool, for where you might watch the heated sunsets of Pantelleria.
description.neighborhood: The dammuso Magia Mediterranea is located in Contrada Penna, in the hills just above Scauri. It`s very easy from here to reach town to make some shopping, having dinner or renting a boat; it´s also very easy to access some of the best spots in Pantelleria such as Niká and the Sataria caves or hike in the Montagna Grande reserve.
description.transit: car rental is the best option and the property have plenty of parking for your car.
description.interaction: A local guy is at your disposition in the case you need anything practical to solve while we are constantly reachable for any advice .

recent.comments:
Mauro is the most thoughtful host. He went far beyond what was necessary to make us feel at home and ensure we had a great time. It was our daughter’s third birthday on the trip, and and he was even kind enough to bring by a gift for her to feel celebrated.

The home is well situated and has such a stunning view. Can’t recommend this home or host enough.

Mauro made our first time on the island so easy from the moment we arrived at the airport. The house is so clean and spacious and the kitchen is fun to cook in. We really loved it and we’ll definitely come back next year. Actually, I’ve talked it up too much, I should book now.

Wir fühlten uns von Anfang an wie in einem Zuhause, das wir bisher einfach noch nicht kannten… sowohl Insel wie Unterkunft liessen uns wunderbar entspannen und Kraft tanken. Mauro als Host (und seine Familie gleichermassen) war aufmerksam, top kommunikativ und hat ein Riesenherz.
Danke für unsere tolle Erfahrung!
A volte non servono troppe parole. Tutto perfetto! Grazie mille;)

Splendida location tutto come nella descrizione !!
Speriamo di tornare presto in questo luogo magico !!Posizione unica e comodissima .

Mauro’s place was so beautiful and magical. There’s a certain spirit to it that’s indescribable. Mauro was also a great host! As a solo traveler who had never been to Pantelleria, he gave me a quick tour of where to get groceries and the essentials, and I appreciated that so much. I got to meet his family too and they were so delightful to talk to. If you want to have an unforgettable time in a beautiful airbnb and amazing island, look no further. This place is it!

Amazing island, amazing Mauro and amazing Damuso ! Mauro greeted us as family and was very helpful with every thing. He gave us so many tips and his love for the island is  totally communicative! The Damuso is beautiful , nicely furnished, clean and peaceful, easy to live in with a direct view over the sea and great sunsets. The sea is 3 minutes away by foot and the house has a great location close to the village of Scauri and all the accommodations and nice restaurants . A little heaven in this magical island . We will be back!

description.summary:
A silent place, where you can sleep listening to sound of sea, in the morning have a swim and soon after  breakfast on your terrace watching boats passing by.
This place is a little paradise where sky, stars and sea will give you a feeling of peace and relaxation.
Romantic sunsets on the African side of the island are admired from private terrace. 
The complex consists of 2 independent dammusi, rented separately maximum privacy, see photo.

hosts.about: I am happy when my guests are happy.  World traveller and Italian I have been in the home sharing world since 2013. I am the director of The Villa Italy, a collection of 6 luxury villas owned by one family, we are not an agency. These villas include Villa Prenzano, Corte Pantesca I & Corte Pantesca II in Pantelleria and Villa Monti di Luna in Forte dei Marmi, which I have listed here in Airbnb. I am also the owner of Refugi Blau, a lovely design apartment in the beautiful island of Menorca, Spain. No matter where you choose to stay, I will do my best to offer you a memorable holiday!

recent.comments: Corte Pantesca 1 is wild, secluded, stunning, and amazingly comfortable. It’s a very special place one doesn’t want to leave and can’t wait to get back to. It’d be amazing to rent both Corte 1 and Corte 2 with friends. It’s 10-15 minutes to the port or the airport or the town of Scauri. The pool is strange and wonderful and there are several little magical spaces around the property. Will definitely come back. Thank you to Arabella & Antonio who sorted everything out and to Paola for setting up such an incredible place.

items.comments: Corte Pantesca 1 is wild, secluded, stunning, and amazingly comfortable. It’s a very special place one doesn’t want to leave and can’t wait to get back to. It’d be amazing to rent both Corte 1 and Corte 2 with friends. It’s 10-15 minutes to the port or the airport or the town of Scauri. The pool is strange and wonderful and there are several little magical spaces around the property. Will definitely come back. Thank you to Arabella & Antonio who sorted everything out and to Paola for setting up such an incredible place.

We stayed 4 nights in the villa and our stay was incredible. The location is great and calm (neighbouring houses are far away). The building has been renovated recently to high standard and outside areas are well maintained. The infinity pool was definitely an highlight and we enjoyed relaxing on the deck chairs. I would definitely recommend to stay here if you have the opportunity to come to Pantelleria.
We loved our stay in Pantelleria, the villa was beautiful and we hope to return soon.
highly recommend! the home is incredible and in an amazing location. everything was chic, clean and exactly like the pictures. host was very friendly and helpful.

Corte Pantesca was a little oasis in the middle of a wild island. We stayed for 5 days as part of our honeymoon, it was beautifully remote and quiet. The outdoor shower and outdoor kitchen was a real highlight. The house was extremely authentic whilst modern inside. The pool is beautiful and relaxing amongst a lovely garden filled with a huge range of flowers. We loved every day of our stay and hope to get back there one day soon. If anyone is travelling to Pantelleria which I would highly recommend Corte Pantesca is a great place to stay and Paolo is extremely helpful and hospitable. 
Thank you!

The perfect place to stay when visiting Pantelleria. This is a stunning home which is not only stylish, cool and made for relaxing and enjoying life but also felt like a home from home. I would certainly recommend this property to anyone. Communication was outstanding. Great sunsets and amazing stargazing.
Great job all! I don’t really write reviews when I’m traveling. Airbnb forces my hand with their silly time limit.

description.summary:
An 18th century Dammuso, Pantelleria’s typical lava rock house totally renovated in a sober and elegant minimalist style with pool, sea views and located in the sunset side of the island. If you love tranquillity, nature and beauty, Corte Pantesca is the perfect retreat for you. Corte Pantesca, Pantelleria belongs to The Villa Italy a collection of exquisite privately owned Villas in Italy. We offer a technology detox: we have no WIFI, dishwasher and washing machine.
CIR: 19081014C205650
description.space:
Imagine gazing at the Mediterranean sea while sipping your morning coffee onto the terrace of a fabulous Dammuso. Gorgeous views, scent of herbs, capers and oregano fill the air, brought by the velvety breeze. Lush terraced gardens surround the island and bring you back to yet another paradise.

Villa Italy's Corte Pantesca 1, Pantelleria offers you 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a vast land around, a fantastic pool shared with Corte Pantesca 2 and a great outdoor shower with hot water.
You could also rent Corte Pantesca 2, another gorgeous dammuso part of our Corte, with a capacity for 4 more people. Ask us and we will tell you more.

Ideal for one or two couples (or up to 4 couples if you rent Corte Pantesca 2) or a family seeking relaxation. It is private, spacious and peaceful.

Corte Pantesca 1 is composed by two distinct buildings united by a "cannizzo", the typical local open air shaded patio with broad views into Pantelleria’s wild nature and the sea.

Two separate house bodies, one with a sea-view master bedroom (king size bed) and bathroom; another with a kind size bed (160x200) with bathroom.

Lazying on the patio or on the pool, reading books or taking siesta, and for your meals the BBQ area will be just perfect to grill the delicious products that the land of Pantelleria offers. The kitchen is equipped with the essentials. You can dine under cover in the "cannizzo" or out in the garden under the stars! And if you want to experience the local cuisine, let our restaurant guide inspire you with one of the many restaurants on the island.

We look forward to offering you a memorable holiday!
description.notes: We offer a technology detox: we have no WIFI, dishwasher and washing machine.
description.transit: We recommend to rent a scooter or a car to tour around the island. Corte Pantesca can be easily accessed from the airport and is near to food shopping and restaurants but a car or scooter is needed.

hosts.about:
Hi, ich bin Jutta und freue mich, dass Du Dich für unsere Unterkunft interessierst. Ich arbeite im Service-Team der Interhome Group und kümmere mich sehr gerne um Deine Fragen. Interhome ist seit 1965 Spezialist in der Vermietung von Ferienhäusern und Ferienwohnungen. Wir vermieten Unterkünfte in den schönsten Ferienzielen Europas sowohl im Sommer als auch im Winter. Unser Team besichtigt die Unterkünfte persönlich! Qualität und ein sehr gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis stehen für uns an erster Stelle. Noch Fragen? Wir freuen uns auf Dich!

Hi, my name is Jutta. Thank you for your interest in our property. I am a service team staff member at Interhome Group and will gladly assist you with any questions. Interhome is a tour operator, specialized in the segment of holiday home rentals since 1965. We offer holiday accommodations in Europe’s most attractive holiday destinations, in the summer as well as in the winter seasons. Our teams visits the properties personally! High quality as well as fair and attractive prices are most important to us. Any questions? Contact us. We look forward to hearing from you soon!

Torre Suda: Cosy, comfortable villa "Prestige Pool Trullo", surrounded by trees. 3 km from the centre of Racale, 4 km from the centre of Taviano, 1.5 km from the sea, 1.5 km from the beach. Private: garden 4'600 m2 with wildlife garden and trees, swimming pool (12 x 5 m, depth 120 - 120 cm, seasonal availability: 01.Apr. - 31.Oct.). Outdoor shower, garden furniture, barbecue, pool maintenance by the owner/gardener. In the house: sun terrace, burglar alarm system, washing machine, tumble dryer. Parking on the premises. Shop 2 km, grocery 2 km, supermarket 2 km, restaurant 2 km, bar 1 km, rocky beach "Torre Suda" 1.5 km. Nearby attractions: Punta Pizzo e Punta della Suina 8 km, Gallipoli 18 km, Santa Maria di Leuca 36 km, Castro 38 km. Please note: car recommended.
description.notes:
1. Availability
All open availabilites are instant bookable. Please choose your dates and confirm your reservation without waiting for host approval.

2. Pricing
We are always offering you our best price and are unable to offer additional discounts.
Please select your preferred travel dates to view the final price.
Optional services described in the house rules can booked after successful reservation by directly contacting us.

3. COVID Policy
We are offering flexibility in case of restrictions in the home and/or destination country:

Has an official travel warning or travel ban been issued for your travel destination, are borders closed and you would therefore no longer like to start your journey?
Up to and including 22 days before your travel date: you can change or cancel your booking free of charge.
If an official travel warning / border closure or a new official travel ban is issued within the 21 days before your journey begins: you can change or cancel your booking free of charge, but only for these cases.

Has a legal obligation to quarantine been introduced in your destination country which cannot be avoided by providing documented proof of a negative test result / documentation of recovery or vaccination and you would therefore no longer like to start your journey?
Up to and including 22 days before your travel date: you can change or cancel your booking free of charge.
If a new legal obligation to quarantine has been introduced within the 21 days before your journey begins: you can change or cancel your booking free of charge, but only for these cases

Has a legal obligation to quarantine been introduced upon return to your home country which cannot be avoided by providing documented proof of a negative test result / documentation of recovery or vaccination and you would therefore no longer like to start your journey?
You cannot change or cancel your booking free of charge. 
Exception: the legal obligation to quarantine applies for 4 days or longer: 
Up to and including 22 days before your travel date: you can change your travel date for the same property free of charge, i.e. for a later stay in the originally booked property.
If a new legal obligation to quarantine has been introduced within the 21 days before your journey begins: you can change your travel date for the same property free of charge, i.e. for a later stay in the originally booked property.

For all other circumstances please refer to the Airbnb cancellation conditions.

4. Check-in information
28 days before check-in, you will receive your travel documents with information regarding your reservation, including the phone number of the key holder.
Please contact the key holder directly 7 days before arrival to confirm arrival time.

5. House Rules
We share all property details in the comprehensive description. Please read both the description and house rules.
If available you will find optional amenities described in the house rules, which can be requested by directly contacting us.
description.house_rules:
CheckInTime: 18:00 - 20:00
Number of free infants: Till 2023 Nov 24 : 0.
Compulsory extra costs: 
Breakage deposit in cash EUR 500,00 Payable in resort fixed price.
Additional services which can be booked (please send us a message): 
Cot (up to 2 years) on request for free available.
Pet EUR 112,00 Bookable extra fixed price.

Standard Contract Terms

1. General Your contractual partner is the company HHD AG Glattbrugg/Switzerland (hereinafter also simply known as HHD). By entering into an agreement with AXA Versicherungen AG, HHD has ensured that in the event of HHD becoming insolvent, you are assured of having your travel expenses refunded. Further details can be found in the section Insolvency protection. Moreover, the following booking terms and conditions shall apply; these are in addition to the statutory regulations.

2. Entering into a booking contract 
2.1. A booking may be made either with your travel agent or in writing, by phone or e-mail to HHD or through the internet. By making a booking you are submitting a binding offer to enter into a contract with HHD. The electronic confirmation of receipt of your booking shall not in itself constitute a confirmation of acceptance of your booking. The invitation to tender for holiday rental arrangements by HHD and the supplementary information from HHD alone shall determine the scope and type of the services to be rendered under the contract, provided that you have them when placing an order.
2.2. Please ensure the contractual commitments of those people for whom you are making the booking are as if you are making the booking for yourself, provided that you have entered into this commitment by making an express and separate declaration to that effect.
2.3. The booking contract is in the form of the booking confirmation sent to you by HHD on a durable data carrier, which will take place straightaway, and within 7 days of the booking being received. If there is a discrepancy between the booking confirmation and the booking made, please advise HHD as soon as possible so a revised offer can be sent to you. The new offer is brought to the attention of HHD on the basis of the change and it has fulfilled its pre-contractual duties to provide information and that you have stated your express declaration to accept the offer or have done so by making a payment in advance within the period advised by HHD.
2.4. We would point out that under the statutory regulations you are not entitled to a right of revocation for the services offered to you. The regulations listed in these terms and conditions under Withdrawal shall apply. The correction of manifest errors, e.g. as a result of printing or arithmetical mistakes or allocation errors in the internet is reserved.
2.5. The subsequent renting out of holiday homes and apartments with HHD is not allowed as is the marketing as a trip organiser with its own pricing.
2.6. We are happy to consider any customer requests when a booking is made. Please note, however, that HHD is unable to guarantee that such requests will be met. Special requests as well as bookings made subject to conditions and verbal agreements shall only be valid in those cases in which they have been confirmed by HHD.
2.7. Bookings for ferries and hire cars shall only be made by HHD acting in the capacity of a third party, and no obligations shall accrue to HHD, nor can it be held liable for contractual disruptions of any type. Transactions shall be based upon the terms and conditions of business/terms and conditions of cancellation of the respective service provider.

3. Payments/Travel documents/ Withdrawal in the event of a default in payment 
3.1. obsolete
3.2. obsolete
3.3. obsolete

4. Special terms and instructions 
4.1. The services offered by us are, as a matter of principle, not suitable for people with restricted mobility. We would be happy, however, to advise you on a case-by-case basis on such matters.
4.2. Ancillary costs on site According to legal precedent, fixed costs (obligatory ancillary costs) which have to be paid in all cases, are fixed costs and included in the booking price. Variable costs dependent upon the number of people travelling, the composition of the travel group or upon consumption (e.g. visitor tax, electricity, gas, heating, firewood, water, laundry charges) some of which are to be paid to the Owner or Key-holder, depending upon the level of consumption at the holiday property. As a rule, payment is to be made in cash. If ancillary costs are listed, they shall be charged at the stated amount for children above the age of two years.
4.3. When handing over the keys, the Owner or Key-holder is entitled to request a suitable deposit. The deposit is normally in Euros. If credit cards are accepted, this is shown on your Booking Confirmation. The deposit will be reimbursed on site when the rented premises have been returned in appropriate condition. In some cases the deposit may only be reimbursed to the customer by bank transfer after the customers departure. Any compensation claims from the Owner for damages will not be affected by the reimbursement of the deposit paid for the keys. The deposit and handling of the deposit, as well as the settlement of the ancillary costs on site, are not covered by the booking contract with HHD as the trip organiser.
4.4. No information will be provided as to how much the visitor tax in the individual resort will cost when thebrochures are sent out, since the precise amounts are, as a rule, still not known at the time of publication. Depending on the resort, visitors should expect to pay between 0.50 and 7.00 per person/day (reduced rates are normally available for children).
4.5. Cleaning the rental property Basic cleaning is to be carried out by you as the customer, regardless of the fact that a final clean will be carried out by the Property Owner. The basic clean includes cleaning the kitchen surfaces, rinsing and putting away the crockery, removing all the remaining food as well as all rubbish, stripping the beds, and sweeping or vacuuming all rooms so that the rented premises can be returned in a swept-clean condition. The final clean includes, amongst other things, a thorough clean of the kitchen/kitchenette, bath/shower/ toilet and washing the floors. In some properties you will be offered the option of cleaning the holiday apartment/ holiday home yourself and leaving the cleaning to the Owner/ Key-holder will incur a fee reflecting normal rates charged for cleaning in that resort. You can find information about this in the description of the respective property.
4.6. It will be shown on the Booking Confirmation documents whether bedding and towels are provided at the rented properties or if visitors have to bring their own, or possibly if they have to be hired from the keyholder as a compulsory requirement. The standard width for double beds and double sofa beds is 1.40 m. If bedding and/or hand towels can be hired in the resort and you wish to use this service, please state this at the time of booking. Whilst tea towels are often provided by the Owner, we do still recommend that guests bring their own. Visitors should always bring their own beach towels. As a rule, visitors should bring toilet paper, washing-up liquid and detergents with them.
4.7. It will state in the Booking Confirmation whether additional beds and/ or cots are provided. You should always bring bedding with you for a cot. Please check if a cot is included in the maximum number of persons allowed to rent the property, or whether another person (child) may stay at the said rental property. Cots are generally suitable for children up to the age of 2. Additional beds and costs must always be ordered when a booking is made and in some cases confirmed to the guest. The order confirmation must include a note to the effect that an extra bed/or cot has been booked. As a rule it is only possible to have one extra bed or one cot.
4.8. Pets The Booking Confirmation also states whether a pet (basically a dog or cat) is allowed at the holiday accommodation. A pet must always be registered when making a booking and information must be supplied describing the pet and its size, even if the property information states that pets are allowed. Permission to bring a pet shall, as a matter of principle, only be granted for one pet, unless the property details state otherwise. If pets are not allowed at the property, this does not mean that it can be guaranteed that no pets at all will be allowed in the building, or in the holiday complex, or that there will be times when pets are not allowed in the building in which your rental property is located. Whether there are any pets depends upon the ownership structure of a holiday complex, as some properties there will be owner- occupied, so that they are not subject to any regulations imposed upon visitors. Or the Owner of a rural property may have a dog himself and does not want his dog to come into contact with visiting dogs. If, on the other hand, pets are allowed, this will not automatically mean they may do as they wish and go anywhere. In almost all holiday complexes dogs will not be allowed in swimming pool enclosures and on the grass, and they certainly will not be allowed to enter restaurants or similar public areas. Dog owners are often asked to put their dog on a lead. Dogs are not allowed to enter the swimming pools of individual houses. Pets must not be left on their own in rented premises. The EU or CH pet identification showing that the pet has been vaccinated against rabies is a legal requirement and recognised in almost all countries. The animals must be identifiable by means of a microchip. Certain breeds of dog, mostly the so-called fighting dogs, are subject to strict regulations in many countries, or are subject to a blanket prohibition. Please find out the regulations applicable to you in good time, preferably from your vet or via the internet. If pets are brought along without permission, HHD may insist that the animals concerned are removed. The right of termination to which HHD is entitled under Point 7 shall not be affected by the above.
4.9. The holiday homes and apartments are supplied with a full set of crockery and cutlery sufficient for the number of booked guests. Technical domestic appliances such as ovens, microwaves, washing machines, coffee makers, or washing machines will only be provided if they have been expressly mentioned in the description of the holiday property.
4.10. Heating Heating is not always available in holiday accommodation in summer destinations, especially in the south. Central heating in the form of gas heating systems, electric heating, paraffin heaters, or wood pellet stoves is generally switched on/off by guests themselves. If there is a heating system, information about how it can be switched on and off will be provided by the Owner/Key-holder.
4.11. TV/TV reception TV in the property description means a colour TV. If reception is possible by satellite or cable, then the TV referred to will mean a satellite TV or cable TV. This does not, however, necessarily mean that there is a guarantee that programmes can be received in all languages.
4.12. Internet/Wifi is only available if expressly mentioned in the property description/confirmation. We will not guarantee that it will be available all the time, nor guarantee speed, compatibility and security. As a result, you will be responsible for taking adequate security measures for your devices. Use may be restricted. Internet/ Wifi is normally provided for holiday purposes and is therefore not suitable for business use or similar. Use of the internet/Wifi is at the users own risk. Applicable laws must be observed when using internet/Wifi. In particular, you will be obliged to refrain from downloading files or accessing data containing material (e.g. films pieces of music) protected by copyright but which are nevertheless illegally disseminated in the internet via file-sharing networks or similar. Likewise, you are not permitted to download files with criminal content or using illegal means. Furthermore, you will be obliged to point out to those travelling with you (including underage visitors) that they must obey the law applicable and conduct regular checks. In the event that a culpable breach is committed, as stipulated in this text under the heading Internet/Wifi, you shall indemnify us from all third party claims.
4.13. If the property information states there is garden/patio furniture available, this does not necessarily mean that there will be a garden chair available for every person. This also applies to sun loungers, which are often in limited supply. Covers for sun loungers are not provided by many Owners for hygiene reasons. Sun loungers and sun shades are likewise only available if they are mentioned in the property details.
4.14. Please note, property information also states whether a holiday home or a holiday complex has a swimming pool, usually along with information about the season opening dates of the pool. Please note, however, that the dates stated for the beginning and end of the season may be changed due to weather conditions. Please take note of the opening hours stated by the management for swimming pools in holiday complexes and any particular rules there may be governing the use of the swimming pool. These may for example include rules regarding the wearing of swimming shorts in the swimming pool, playing with balls, the use of lilos etc. or state that bathing caps must be worn (in Italy in particular).
4.15. Duty to exercise care As a Tenant you will be entitled to use the entire rented property including furniture and household objects. You will be obliged to handle the rented premises and its inventory plus any communal fixtures with maximum care. You will be obliged to make good any damage caused by you or the guests accompanying you while you are renting the property. Damage caused may be offset against your breakage deposit.
4.16. You are not allowed to use or plug in items with a high charging load such as air conditioning, minipools, e-bikes, electric cars etc.
4.17. In some large holiday complexes you will be asked to wear an wristband. Holidaymakers will have to wear an armband for organisational reasons and to make it possible for guests of the complex to be identified.
4.18. The rented premises must not be occupied and used by a greater number of guests than stated in the brochure or on the website and confirmed in the booking confirmation. The maximum number of people stated also includes children and toddlers, unless otherwise agreed with HHD and confirmed in the booking confirmation. Overcrowding a rented property will entitle HHD to increase the rental on a proportional basis plus any additional costs retrospectively. The right of termination in Point 7 to which HHD is entitled will not be affected by the above.
4.19. The infrastructure operators named in the documents (means of transport, shops, restaurants, sports facilities, public beaches and their fixtures etc.) are not covered by our services and HHD cannot be held responsible for any disruption to such infrastructure. These facilities shall be responsible for deciding their opening hours etc. The same shall apply for the public and private utilities (such as water works and electricity supplier). Information provided about the weather shall not constitute a guarantee. Any obligations we may have to clarify matters, provide information and to exercise care shall not be affected by the above.
4.20. Special offers Any variable ancillary costs which may be incurred when visitors take advantage of special offers, e.g. 3 for the price of 2 or 7 for the price of 5, a percentage reduction on the rent, promotional campaigns such as for example, discounts for early bookings, or special offers for families and OAPs sales shall have to be paid for the full duration of a stay.
4.21. As a rule, the time of arrival should be between 16:00 and 19:00 hrs on the intended arrival date. If, during the journey to the resort you note that you will probably be arriving late, it is essential that you inform the Key-holder in good time. He will endeavour to be present upon your arrival (a fee may be charged for this). However, there is no guarantee that this can be arranged. Please arrange alternative arrival times with the keyholder/ HHD if necessary.
4.22. Please hand over your travel documents to the Key-holder upon arrival. The keys will not necessarily be handed over to you upon your arrival/ returned by you at your holiday accommodation, or resort itself. During the season you may have to wait at the place specified where the key is to be handed over to you/returned by you.
4.23. You must make every effort to arrive on the date stated in the travel confirmation, as arriving on alternative dates cannot always be catered for, for organisational reasons. You must always enquire with HHD in advance as to whether it is possible to arrive on an alternative date. If this is possible, it will be confirmed by HHD.
4.24. If you are unable to occupy the property as agreed, as a result, for example, of very heavy traffic on the roads, or for personal reasons, and there are no unavoidable and exceptional circumstances at your destination, or in its immediate vicinity making it much more difficult for you to arrive on time, (as mentioned under Point 6), HHD shall be entitled to receive the payment regulated under Number 6. The same shall apply if you leave the premises early.
4.25. On your departure date as stated in the travel confirmation, the rented premises must be vacated and handed over in a clean condition, i.e. the same condition as it was presented to you, to the Owner, or his representative, no later than 10:00 hrs. Please find alternative departure times, should you need them, in your travel documents.

5. Amendments to the contents of your contract prior to setting off on your outward journey from home HHD may amend features of the booking, not affecting the price, before the contract commences, provided that such differences are minor and do not have a detrimental impact upon the overall arrangement of the booking and provided that they have not arisen as a result of acting in bad faith. The Customer will be notified of this straightaway on a durable data carrier once the reason for the change has been ascertained. In the event that there is a considerable change in the contract, you will be entitled to accept the change within the period of time set by us at the same time as the notification, or to withdraw from the contract without receiving compensation or to accept an alternative holiday property, if this has been offered by us. Should you fail to respond within the period of time set by us, the offer made by us to amend the contents of the contract shall be regarded as having been accepted. Any warranty claims that may arise shall not be affected.

6. Withdrawal/Compensation/Replacement guests 
6.1. You may withdraw from the booking at any time prior to the holiday start date. It will be the receipt of the statement of withdrawal by HHD which shall determine whether you have cancelled on time. If the booking was made through a travel agent, you may also inform the travel agent of your withdrawal. Please ensure the withdrawal statement is sent via a durable data carrier. If you withdraw from the booking before the start date or do not arrive at your holiday property, you will be entitled to receive reasonable compensation instead of a claim to have the price of the trip refunded. If HHD is responsible for your withdrawal, or if exceptional circumstances arise at the destination or in its immediate vicinity, making it much more difficult for the booking to take place or for you to travel to the destination, HHD cannot demand payment. Unavoidable and exceptional circumstances are beyond the control of HHD and their consequences could not have been avoided even if all reasonable precautions have been taken.
6.2. HHD has laid down the following cancellation charges taking into consideration the period of time between the withdrawal statement and the beginning of the trip as well as taking the expected savings into consideration and the expected gain from the holiday property being used by someone else. As a rule our withdrawal fees are as follows: 50 % of the rental price up to 31 days before the start of the services. The entire booking price is charged if withdrawal is later or you are a no-show. You, as the Tenant, will be asked to prove that HHD has not incurred any losses, or losses significantly less than the lump sums demanded. At your request we are obliged to substantiate the amount of compensation demanded by us. If, as a result of your withdrawal, we are obliged to refund you the cost of the booking, we shall do so straightaway, and in all cases within 14 days from your withdrawal.
6.3. Before the rental period, HHD may withdraw from the contract if it is not possible to fulfil the contract due to unavoidable and exceptional circumstances. In this case HHD shall forfeit its right to the full payment of the booking.
6.4. You are entitled to nominate a replacement Tenant to take your place: he/she shall enter the contract with HHD in your place. The precondition for this, however, is that HHD receives notification to this effect on a durable data carrier at least seven days prior to the beginning of the trip, so that the necessary rebooking arrangements can be made. HHD may object to the replacement tenant nominated by you if the named replacement tenant is unable to fulfil the specific requirements of the booking, or if there are statutory regulations and/ or official instructions prohibiting this. The replacement guest shall enter into the rights and duties of the rental contract previously held by you when HHD confirms the nominated replacement tenant. The costs incurred by HHD as a result of this change shall be charged to you at € 20 per change.

7. Termination of contract for conduct-related reasons HHD may terminate the rental contract without observing a notice period if the holidaymaker persistently disrupts the stay, in spite of being warned to refrain from doing so, or if he conducts himself in breach of the contract to such an extent that the immediate cancellation of his contract is justified. This shall apply, for example, if other people are placed at risk. In this case the rental price will be forfeited, whereby saved expenditure or benefits as a result of being able to allocate the services etc. to another person shall be offset by HHD, including any sums which may have been credited by service providers.

8. Duty to notify 
8.1. As a Customer you will have to inform HHD or your travel agent if you have not received the necessary travel documents within the time notified by us. In keeping with the statutory regulations, should there possibly be a disruption in the services provided, you will be obliged to take all reasonable steps to rectify the fault and keep damage to a minimum, or to prevent it. Customers are therefore obliged to notify HHD of complaints straightaway. If you fail to meet this obligation, the result may be that you will not be entitled to a claim arising from defective contractual fulfilment if they could have been rectified had you notified them as required. (Only in such a case will the so-called obligation to reduce damage apply.)
8.2. If the rental property is not presented in accordance with the contract, or if there are any defects in the rented accommodation, you may request a remedy. In this case please contact us straightaway (or alternatively via your travel agent),
so that any suitable measures specified by HHD may be taken to review the complaint, and, if necessary, to put right the disruption to services, or to provide a replacement of equivalent value. The decision to put right the disruption to services or to provide a replacement of equivalent value shall be made by HHD. The contract may only be terminated subject to the provisions below in Point 8.3. The service providers (Owner, Key-holder, Agency etc.) are not party to the contract and do not function as a tour management, nor are they representatives of HHD, nor are they authorised to recognise claims and to submit and/or receive legally-binding declarations.
8.3. You may only assert claims against HHD on account of booking services not having been rendered in accordance with the contract after the rental period has ended and subject to the following circumscribed preconditions, whereby we recommend as a matter of urgency that a claim is made via a durable data carrier. Your travel agent (Travel agency, internet travel portal etc.) is authorised to take receipt of notifications of claims and compensation claims and to forward them on to HHD. The precondition for this is that the booking services or the replacement services accepted by you have not been rendered in accordance with the contract, and in addition to this, that you have not failed to report the defect immediately and that a sufficient remedy has not been forthcoming. If the stay was adversely affected to a significant extent as a result of defects, you may withdraw from the rental contract and have a proportion of the price you paid for the rental refunded in addition to any other expenses you may have incurred. As a rule, the precondition for this is that you notified HHD that the service was not rendered in accordance with the contract, setting HHD a reasonable period of time and that you requested a remedy, and this period of time elapsed without the remedy being effected. You will not have to set a period of time if a remedy is impossible, or if HHD, as the tour operator, refuses to do so, or if an immediate remedy is required.

9. Liability/Limitation of liability 
9.1. If there is something wrong with the booking, i.e. the rental booking is not fulfilled as specified in the contract, irrespective of a reduction in the price of the booking, or termination by you (or withdrawal) you may also claim compensation for damages, unless the defect is attributable to the following causes: - culpable acts or failure on your part or on the part of a person travelling with you and sharing accommodation to take appropriate action; - unforeseeable or unavoidable failure to perform by third parties who are not involved in rendering the contractual services; - unavoidable, exceptional circumstances.
9.2. External factors, force majeure, and special regional factors such as the presence of insects, stray dogs, inclement weather conditions or the condition of public roads will not entitle you to assert a claim against HHD. Claims against HHD on account of a breach of pre-contractual or contractual duties to provide clarification shall not be affected by the above.
9.3. The liability of HHD for damages arising from a breach of contractual duties, and which are not physical injury and which have not been caused as a result of intent or gross negligence shall be limited to three times the price of the trip. Any claims which are made over and above this, under international agreements or on the statutory regulations based on them, shall not be affected by these limitations of liability.
9.4. The liability for property damage for compensation claims for damages based on illicit acts asserted against HHD not attributable to intent or gross negligence shall be limited to three times the booking rental price.

10. Limitation 
The holidaymakers claim shall lapse after two years. These claims cover in particular the right to request a remedy as well, if HHD contrary to its duty fails to do so, finding a remedy himself and demanding reimbursement of the necessary expenditure. Furthermore, you will be entitled to request a remedy by means of alternative travel services (substitute services) as well as the costs incurred by you when alternative accommodation may be necessary. If the relevant preconditions have been satisfied, you may terminate the contract as well as assert the right arising from a reduction of the booking price and demand compensation for damages or the reimbursement of expenditure incurred by you. The period of limitation shall commence on the day in the booking period is due to end, according to the contract. The statutory regulations suspending the period of limitation shall also apply in this case. The period of limitation applicable for claims asserted on account of death, personal injury and physical harm, gross negligence or intentional breaches of duty by HHD, a legal representative or assistants of HHD shall be determined in each case by the statutory regulations. Claims asserted by HHD shall become invalid six months after the end of the booking period.

11. Ombudsman 
Prior to settling any dispute that may arise between you and HHD, you should approach the independent ombudsman responsible for the travel industry. Should any problems arise between you and HHD, or the booking agency through which you made the booking, the ombudsman will endeavour to come up with a fair and balanced solution: Ombudsman der Schweizer Reisebranche Zürich 

12. Insolvency protection for the customer In the event that HHD should become insolvent, the insurance company providing insolvency protection named below will ensure that the rental price paid by the Customer will be refunded in the event that HHD becomes insolvent: 1. Travel services are cancelled or 2. The holidaymaker fulfils demands for payment made by service providers for travel services rendered, when HHD has failed to fulfil claims for payment of the same services. Should HHD become insolvent, this shall be regarded as being the equivalent of the opening of insolvency proceedings on the assets of HHD, and the rejection of an application for the opening of such proceedings on account of insufficient assets. The above liability of the insurance company providing insolvency protection is limited. It shall only be liable for all the sums to be refunded by him in one year up to a total amount of 45 million CHF. Should this sum not suffice to cover all customers, the amount refunded shall be reduced by the ratio of the total amount of the claim to the maximum amount of cover. Sums payable shall only be refunded after the year (01.01 to 31.12) in which the event insured against occurs has ended. The insurance company providing insolvency protection is AXA Versicherungen AG, Kredit & Kaution, Postfach 357, CH-8401 Winterthur, a business domiciled in Switzerland and covered by the Swiss financial supervisory authority. Should you have any queries, please contact: AXA Versicherungen AG, Kredit & Kaution, Winterthur; 

13. Data protection 
Our data protection statement shall apply for handling personal data in connection with these General Contractual Terms and Conditions.

14. Recommendation for a private liability insurance policy 
As a rule, private liability insurance policies will also cover damage caused by you as a Customer in holiday homes/apartments. We would recommend that you check whether your insurance policy also covers this type of damage in other countries as well.

15. Regulations governing passports, visas, health, customs and foreign currency 
As the Customer, you are personally responsible for complying with the regulations in force for both Switzerland and other countries governing entry and exit, as well as health regulations, passport and visa regulations, and the regulations governing the entry of pets. Travel and security regulations, entry regulations, visa and health regulations are shown in the website of the Swiss Foreign Office. The embassies/consulates in the countries you will be visiting will also provide you with information. All fines accrued by you as a result of failure to comply with these regulations, in particular the payment of withdrawal costs, shall be your responsibility, unless they are the result of having been supplied with false or insufficient information by HHD.

16. Choice of law and Other Provisions 
16.1. Applicable law 
If it is possible to choose a law, the Parties shall decide that Swiss law shall apply.
16.2. Other Provisions 
The above provisions shall not apply if, and insofar as, provisions laid down in international agreements governing the rental contract between the customer and HHD are mandatory, other provisions shall apply for the benefit of the Customer or if, and insofar as, provisions in the member state of the EU, of which the Customer is a national, are mandatory giving the Customer better terms than those provisions mentioned above or the corresponding German regulations. Should individual provisions in the rental contract be void, this shall not result in the rental contract as a whole becoming void.

Tour operator 
HHD AG
CH-8152 Glattbrugg
