recent.comments: Wonderful house in quiet surroundings, close enough to beaches but with the tranquility that some remoteness ensures. We enjoyed the stay very much. The  owners are very helpful and friendly.

items.comments: Wonderful house in quiet surroundings, close enough to beaches but with the tranquility that some remoteness ensures. We enjoyed the stay very much. The  owners are very helpful and friendly.
Everything worked out perfectly. The entire team enjoyed the stay and felt very comfortable in the Villa!
Posizione molto bella e tranquilla sulla collina sopra Olbia con vista sulla citta’. Bellissimo giardino e casa con tutti i confort , consigliata

…… torneremo d‘estate 🙂 La villetta principale (c‘è anche una dependance du charme connessa) era perfetta per la nostra famiglia di 5 persone, spaziosa, soleggiata, ovviamente tenuta in modo impeccabile, ma francamente la maggior parte del tempo siamo stati in terrazza (bellissima a colazione e al tramonto) ed in giardino. Abbiamo apprezzato molto la vicinanza non solo alle spiagge del golfo Aranci e di Porto Rotondo, ma anche di Olbia con i suoi centri commerciali e dell‘entroterra a sud della Gallura (da consigliare la gola Gorropu).

We spent a wonderful week in this beautiful guesthouse and enjoyed every moment of it. Had a relaxing time in the romantic garden under the olive trees, cooked Italian dinner ourselves in the well-equipped kitchen. Great location, not far from Olbia airport and everything you need or want is also just a short drive away: white sandy beaches, hiking trails with stunning views, shopping, restaurants, golf club... Found the world's best pizza restaurant on our way to Porto Cervo. Will definitely come back! 
Martin & Andrea from Vienna

Everything was perfect, the location is amazing really close to the beaches and the town but very quiet with a fantastic view, the house is wonderful and the garden is a perfect place to relax for sunset. Anastasia and her husband were great hosts and really caring, I would definitely come back next time I’m visiting Sardinia!

5 star rating doesn’t do it justice, as I would gladly give this host and overall experience more stars if I could :)

The host (Anastasie) was amazing, absolutely delightful to deal with. Excellent communication at all times and super helpful with any questions or requests we had. Shetruly helped us get the best experience from our stay as it was our first time in Sardinia. A genuinely great person and the true meaning of a “host”.

As for the villa itself, it was an excellent house, with more rooms and bathrooms that we knew what to do with, and that’s saying something as we were 5 adults and 3 kids. Clean, spacious, comfortable, with an incredible view of the Sardinian landscape and the city of Olbia (especially at night!), it had everything we needed.

In terms of location, it is also super close to all essential locations (ex: 7 min from supermarket, 10 min from town centre, 9 min from airport, etc…). If staying in Olbia, I highly recommend it on location alone.

All in all, it was an excellent experience, and I would not hesitate for a second to highly recommend this to anyone else.

description.summary:
Situated on the hills overlooking Olbia and Golfo Aranci, Villa Anastasie has panoramic views onto the bay and stunning  Mountain Range. Traditional villa, fully equipped and furnished. A well-maintained totally private garden of 2,500 m2 is a Paradise for relaxation.  Private access. 

Perfectly located between the fine white sand  beaches of Costa Smeralda and Golfo Aranci, tasty Sardinian restaurants, wine vineyards, downtown Olbia shopping and 12 min from the Costa Smeralda airport.
description.space:
Villa Anastasie is equipped and furnished in harmony with the surroundings with appropriate materials and colors with beamed ceilings conveying a feeling of welcoming comfort and warmth, and represents the ideal choice of stay for large families with friends who want to spend a vacation immersed in nature and total privacy.

The private drive introduces the property surrounded by a large and well-kept panoramic garden from which you can enjoy a breathtaking view of the sea and the surrounding countryside.

The compound has two Villas, a main Master villa with 200 square meters of living area, Large living room with comfortable furniture, fully equipped kitchen, 3 bedrooms and two bathrooms for 6 people:

1x bedroom with Double Twin size bed (160m) with master bathroom 
1x bedroom with Queen size bed (153m)
1x bedroom with two single beds (90cm) with en-suite bathroom
Washing machine

The second 50m2 villa with 1 bedrooms has two single beds (90cm) and a sofa, with en-suite bathroom, a Kitchenette (with washing machine), ideal for 2 people and complete privacy

All rooms are equipped with air conditioning.
Veranda furnished with dining table
The villas features Wi-Fi, television, washing machines, dishwashers
The house has a private driveway where you park your cars
Smoking is not allowed

Enjoy your beautiful stay!
description.access:
10 min drive from Olbia airport. 
Full access to the villa area
Access through a private olive-tree lined road
Tennis courts for rent - 2 min by car
25m swimming pool - 2min by car (payable)
description.notes:
Tennis enthusiasts will enjoy the Resort de Fenice just an 2 minute (0,5 km) drive from the villa, which also has a large pool area and 25m pool

Bed linens and towels are included in the price.

City Tax will be applied for stays up to 7 days 3,00 euro a day per person (Excluded: children up to 12 years) - To pay on-site only in cash

The check-in is from 16:00 p.m until 21:00 p.m. For check-in between 21:00-22:00, an additional fee of 30 euro will be charged. In case of late check-in (from 22:00 p.m. to 01:00 a.m) an additional fee of 50 euro will be charged.
description.neighborhood: Olbia, Golfo Aranci and Costa Smeralda belong to the municipality of Arzachena, and are part of the region of Gallura (The name of the North Eastern region of Sardinia). Besides the fantastic white sand beaches and the sea that gleams in all shades of blue and green, the typical landscape of the Gallura is characterized by impressive granite formations, that are natural sculptures shaped by the wind, rain and sea. Driving through the countryside, many vineyards can be noticed, with famous vineyards producing fantastic red and white wines.

description.interaction:
Be inspired, relax,    
                                sing, eat, love
Dear Guests, 
We will do our utmost to ensure that you feel comfortable and have a wonderful vacation. If you have any questions we are always reachable by phone and will ensure that all your questions and requests are taken care off.

hosts.about: We're a tour operator from Salento, Apulia. We were born and bread here, even though we travelled all around the world. We know every meter of this lovely corner of the earth!

recent.comments: This dammuso is a sanctuary with a truly rustic character. Off the beaten path awaits a small paradise on the foothills surrounded by capperi, fruit and flowers overlooking the horizon of the sea. Soaking in the pool at sunset is luxurious. Pack some basic amenities and explore the surrounding landscape that Pantelleria has to offer.

recent.comments: Beautiful and very peaceful place. we had a great stay! Highly recommend for families.

items.comments: Beautiful and very peaceful place. we had a great stay! Highly recommend for families.

Just an overall excellent place with helpful hosts. We’d stay here again for sure. Gorgeous surroundings (the property is a beautiful olive grove that’s well maintained and thoughtfully lit). We basically spent our entire time outside eating, grilling and swimming. We are tough critics, but were genuinely pleased.

What a wonderful location. We spend the week here and the place is absolutely magical. 

Everything was very clean and we had all the comforts we needed. 3 spacious rooms and an amazing outdoor area and kitchen with barbecue and a wonderful pool. Also the garden around the pool was very curated and the shade under the trees the perfect place to spend the hot noon hours with our kids.

Sergio and the team were very nice and always available if we needed anything.

We cant wait to come back again soon!

description.summary: Villa Saracena is the ideal choice for those looking for a holiday in a charming residence characterized by relaxation and luxury.
description.space:
Villa Saracena is a luxury home for rent with swimming pool, in Ostuni, a few minutes drive from the historic center and the sea. Immersed in one hectare of magical olive grove, it can accommodate up to 6 people in 3 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms (3 en-suite bathrooms and 1 service bathroom, all with shower).
 
This wonderful property also consists of a charming and large dining room, kitchen equipped with dishwasher, oven, induction cooker and relaxation room with TV and sofa, for authentic moments of privacy.


Outside, dominated by the splendid swimming pool, there is a large solarium with chaises longues and stone seats in pure local style and a large area dedicated to outdoor cooking with a shaded patio for poolside dinners and lunches.

In detail:
- the 10x4m swimming pool and 1.30m deep
- the solarium area with 6 sun loungers, 2 beach umbrellas and an external shower.
- the patio with the outdoor kitchen, with barbeque, induction cooker, table and chairs.

Among the comforts and services:
- Free WIFI
- air conditioning
- Tv
- heating
- set of towels, sheets, pool towels
- washing machine, dishwasher, coffee machine.
- private enclosed parking
  

Villa Saracena is a charming property, surrounded by centuries-old olive trees: an unspoiled paradise where architecture meets the environment and local traditions in an unforgettable alchemy.
description.access: Guests will have the entire property available to them exclusively.
description.notes:
RESIDENCE FEE
- According to the local laws of the Municipality of Ostuni, is required the payment of the tourist tax of 1 Euro for person for night is required (excluding children under 12 years): the total amount will be collected at check-in by the host in cash.
- Upon check-in, the host will ask you to check all guests' documents and make a copy.

EXTRA PAYMENT SERVICES:

payment services. for more information, ask the host directly

- additional/daily cleaning
- linen change service
- home chef service
- transfer service to and from the Bari/Brindisi airport/train station *
- car rental service *
* promotional prices for staying guests
description.transit:
Villa Saracena  is immersed in the green countryside of Ostuni, a quiet area just 5 minutes drive from the town. It is an excellent starting point to visit the beauties of Puglia:
- it is 8 km away from the sea
- 36 km from the nearest airport, Brindisi-Salento
- 38 km from the trulli of Alberobello
- 45 km from Polignano a Mare
- 46 km from the caves of Castellana
description.interaction: - Guests can stay in the structure in total autonomy and relaxation without external disturbances. In case of need, or to request information, they can contact the host and his collaborators even with a message.

gallery.caption: Zona Relax con Vista sul Mare

hosts.about: Dammuso Chicchina è una tipica dimora Pantesca, ove all'interno possiamo ospitare n. 2/3 persone in 1 camera. E' inserito nel comprensorio di Kuddia Attalora con piena vista sul mare e Montagna Grande. Il lusso nei dettagli rendono unica la location.

recent.comments:
Forse, cercando con un po’ di impegno (ma non ne sarei così sicuro..), è possibile trovare dei dammusi più belli di quello di Franca (Chicchina) e Valerio: più grandi, più facili da raggiungere,  più vicini al mare o ai dammusi dei vip..
Ma l’accoglienza che Franca ci ha riservato unita alla sua sensibilità disarmante; la disponibilità di Valerio sempre accompagnata dal sorriso; l’attenzione per l’ospite ed il sincero desiderio di farlo sentire parte dell’isola che  entrambi ci hanno trasmesso: tutto questo insieme alla fortuna di incontrare persone meravigliose, ancor prima che host attenti e professionali, ha reso la nostra breve vacanza una esperienza che non dimenticheremo. Un sincero grazie a Franca, Valerio e Beatrice ed arrivederci a presto!
Inoltre: dammuso incantevole e pulito. Facilmente raggiungibile in auto (necessaria in ogni caso per gli spostamenti sull’isola); tranquillità totale e silenzio indescrivibile la sera. Panorami e tramonti mozzafiato.

items.comments:
Forse, cercando con un po’ di impegno (ma non ne sarei così sicuro..), è possibile trovare dei dammusi più belli di quello di Franca (Chicchina) e Valerio: più grandi, più facili da raggiungere,  più vicini al mare o ai dammusi dei vip..
Ma l’accoglienza che Franca ci ha riservato unita alla sua sensibilità disarmante; la disponibilità di Valerio sempre accompagnata dal sorriso; l’attenzione per l’ospite ed il sincero desiderio di farlo sentire parte dell’isola che  entrambi ci hanno trasmesso: tutto questo insieme alla fortuna di incontrare persone meravigliose, ancor prima che host attenti e professionali, ha reso la nostra breve vacanza una esperienza che non dimenticheremo. Un sincero grazie a Franca, Valerio e Beatrice ed arrivederci a presto!
Inoltre: dammuso incantevole e pulito. Facilmente raggiungibile in auto (necessaria in ogni caso per gli spostamenti sull’isola); tranquillità totale e silenzio indescrivibile la sera. Panorami e tramonti mozzafiato.

Il nostro soggiorno è stato meraviglioso: vista mozzafiato, pace e silenzio tutto intorno, casa bella, pulita e con tutti i comfort. Chicchina è una super host, sempre gentile e disponibile per consigli e per ogni esigenza senza essere mai invadente. 
Super consigliato! 
Speriamo di tornarci presto.

Settimana da sogno nel dammuso di Franca! Sistemazione curata in ogni minimo dettaglio e con tutto quello che può servire a rendere il soggiorno piacevole. Il patio sul mare ci ha regalato tramonti che sarà difficile scordare e ore di quiete tra un’esplorazione e l'altra.
La strada per accedere al dammuso è una tipica strada di Pantelleria - in parte ripida e sterrata, ma facilmente percorribile con auto o scooter e garantisce di essere immersi nella tranquillità e nella natura.
Franca è una host speciale, prodiga di attenzioni e consigli che fanno la differenza! Speriamo di tornare presto!

Una finestra senza tempo sul mare, un contatto diretto con la natura e con l’Africa.
Nei giorni in cui è comparso il sole il panorama lascia senza fiato. Cielo e mare, natura e in lontananza la Tunisia. Ma anche quando piove e le nuvole sono basse a coprire tutto, l’odore della terra, dei fichi, della natura è il racconto di una terra complessa e accogliente.
Il dammuso di Franca e Valerio è curato e molto confortevole, ben arredato e ogni dettaglio è pensato e scelto per rendere la permanenza un’esperienza senza eguali. Il silenzio e la tranquillità sono stati i giusti ingredienti per potersi rilassare. La gentilezza e le attenzioni di Franca e Valerio ci hanno fatto sentire a casa. Abbiamo condiviso con loro cene e chiacchiere anche con amici della coppia davvero interessanti e ospitali. 
Lo raccomandiamo a chi voglia lasciarsi conquistare da questa isola, sperando di tornarci presto, noi ci abbiamo lasciato un pezzo di cuore. Simona & Sergio
Magico, semplicemente magico.

Semplicemente un posto Magico su un'isola magica! dicono tutti che Pantelleria la ami o la odi..probabilmente é cosi! noi siamo stati fortunati perché Franca, Valerio e tutte le persone meravigliose delle quali si circondano ci hanno fatto davvero conoscere l isola in tutte le sue sfaccettature ! nella calda accoglienza, nelle cene sotto quell immenso cielo stellato..nelle risate e in tutte le storie che hanno collezionato in una vita sull'isola! 
GRAZIE!

Siamo stati ospiti nel dammuso della signora Franca, che è un tipico dammuso pantesco, situato su di una collina dove si può godere di una bellissima vista mare con tramonti spettacolari ed un silenzio a cui non eravamo davvero abituati, per non parlare del cielo stellato, che grazie alla bassa luminosità, la notte, viene esaltato.
Il dammuso è davvero molto accogliente, pulito è arredato con gran gusto, dotato di tutto quello che serve.
La signora Franca è un host straordinario, sempre disponibile, che ti accoglie e ti fa sentire come a casa.
Soggiorno assolutamente consigliato.

description.summary: Dammuso Chicca è una tipica dimora Pantesca, ove all'interno possiamo ospitare n. 2 persone in 1 camera da letto uso privato e bagno privato. All'esterno, a disposizione degl'ospiti, ampia zona relax (con sdrai e solarium) con veranda e cucina E' inserito nel comprensorio di Kuddia Attalora con piena vista sul mare e Montagna Grande, circondata da ulivi, frutteti, bougainvillea e tipica fauna Pantesca.L'immersione nella natura e la cura del  lusso nei dettagli rendono unica la location.
description.space:

- Bollitore
- Piastra ad induzione

- Stoviglie per 2 persone inclusi i tegami
- Biancheria per camera, per letto, per cucina

description.neighborhood:
Damuso Chicca è situato sulla collina con il panorama fibesco tipico Pantesco, quiete e relax caratterizzano questa location che dista dal mare km 2.3
Trekking a piedi e bike tutti i sentieri della riserva naturale in cui è sita la location.
description.interaction: A conferma e pagamento effettivo del soggiorno, saremo disponibili con numero di cellulare e riferimenti.
description.house_rules: Tassativo solo 2 persone,

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about:
Pietro has a whole artistic education from high school to university. He’s a painter and most of our homes has a beautiful painting or drawing from his collection .. we are plunged to the art world and have many friends who expose their work in our homes
Gaia,have a degree in architecture in politecnico di Milano and then studied fashion merchandising at parson school in nyc then had an education in tailoring in the amazing Bagatto private school in Bologna ...
I normally sew items from our homes and make a lot of research in flea markets and antiques of little items to add and change details in our decor ...
We love to travel as a family of 4 and love to live in our homes when they are not booked just to experience the strengths and weaknesses to improve to our homes 
We live most of the time in Bologna our hometown and speak Italian English French and Spanish ...
We aim to connect each and every guests to the territory where they choose to stay,what we also live about our job is organizing weddings in our properties this is the best way to connect them to the area Musician, florists, caterings and many more local  vendors ...

description.summary: The magic of a holiday spent in Pantelleria lies in the beautiful mix between nature and architecture built by man: the terraces of cultivated fields with capers and grapes surrounded by drystone walls that design a fascinating path through the island, reaching the dammuso, the typical house of Pantelleria. All these fuse in the Dammusi Posidonia: a recently built dammuso, made up of local materials such as volcanic stones and that combines nature with the surrounding landscape.
description.space: Located in Contrada Penna, in the south west of the island, just near Scauri, the dammuso is immersed into a Mediterrean garden of two acres where you can abandon your senses to the perfume of aromatic plants, the beauty of fruit, capers and olive trees, and the colour of the bougainville.
description.access: This dammuso is included in the farm Dammusi Posidonia,it is a charming structure where you can find three spacious rooms, each one with ensuite bathroom, air conditioning and tv. All the finishings are of excellent taste and really painstaking job, mixing modern and elegant solutions such as the colourful resins and the ecologic paint, contemporary and country furniture mixed together and objects inspired by nature. A unique style, suspended between the Mediterrean atmosphere and cosmopolitan splendour thanks to the objects selected with great taste all around the world.
description.notes: The external area has a chill out zone with sofas and arm chairs, a covered terrace with an external kitchen with wooden oven, perfect for lunches and dinners overlooking the sea, and one last treat: a beautiful 70 sq. meters swimming pool, for where you might watch the heated sunsets of Pantelleria.
description.neighborhood: The  Dammusi Posidonia is located in Contrada Penna, in the hills just above Scauri. It`s very easy from here to reach town to make some shopping, having dinner or renting a boat; it´s also very easy to access some of the best spots in Pantelleria such as Niká and the Sataria caves or hike in the Montagna Grande reserve.
description.transit: car rental is the best option and the property have plenty of parking for your car.
description.interaction: A local guy is at your disposition in the case you need anything practical to solve while we are constantly reachable for any advice .
description.house_rules: The pool may be shared with the guests of the other Dammuso

description.summary:
The room is part of a structure located in the best area of the island of Pantelleria.
It is in fact located less than 50 m from the sea, with the possibility of accessing two distinct coves, cala Tramontana and cala Levante, as well as a third about 50m away, cala dell'Elefante. This particular position allows you to immerse yourself in the crystalline water of the island in all sea conditions, whether rough or not, being able to choose the cove more sheltered from the waves and the wind.
description.space: The room is located on the mezzanine floor of the structure, in addition to the private bathroom, it has a reserved portion of the garden with palm trees, deck chairs, futons and sea view and sunrise view.
description.neighborhood: Piccolo agglomerato di case sul mare, con ottimo ristorante, noleggio barche, kayak e canoe e centro per immersioni.

hosts.about: Con Bookiply potete trovare facilmente la vostra casa vacanze ideale. Un appartamento accogliente sul Lago di Costanza? Una casa di campagna da sogno a Maiorca o un accogliente chalet sulle Alpi? Con lo scopo di rendere il tuo soggiorno, nelle regioni più belle d'Europa, il più confortevole possibile, collaboriamo a stretto contatto con proprietari certificati, le cui proprietà soddisfano i nostri criteri di alta qualità. Oltre a questo offriamo un servizio clienti che vi assiste in modo rapido e diretto per tutte le domande e i dubbi sette giorni su sette.

description.summary: The holiday home 'Antico Dammuso Al Tramonto' is located in Pantelleria and boasts a beautiful view of the sea. Guests can also enjoy spectacular views of the sunset, and on clear days the Tunisian coast can be seen. The 84 m² property consists of a main house, 2 bedrooms, with 2 bathrooms. In total, the property can accommodate 6 people. Additional amenities include a TV, heating as well as fans in the bedrooms. Despite the lack of air conditioning, the property stays very cool.
description.notes:
The holiday home boasts a private outdoor area with a garden, an open terrace, 2 covered terraces, a barbecue and an outdoor shower with hot water.
The property is 6 km from the centre of the island and the beach.
8 parking spaces are available on the property.
One pet is allowed.
Air conditioning and Wi-Fi are not available.
This property has guidelines to help guests with the correct separation of waste. More information is provided on site.
description.house_rules:
Please keep in mind that you will be requested to submit both your arrival data (passport data, flight data, contact information) after booking so that the homeowner can plan your stay and check-in accordingly.
Maximum number of Pets: 1
Possible extra fees specified in the description need to be paid on site.
